author: Neal Beets
text:
Does your city or town use project collaboration software like Basecamp, Microsoft Project, OpenProj, Asana, or Trello?
Does your city or town use enterprise social network software like Yammer, Jive, Box, Chatter, or Mangoapps?
If so, is it producing the results you hoped for?  What would you do differently if you were to deploy it in your city or town again?  Who in your organization can we talk to about your set-up?
Thanks for your help.
Neal Beets
Town Manager
Windham, CT
title: Project Management or Enterprise Social Network Software
